chapter.title: Set up the environment and authenticate
chapter.para: To follow the examples in this guide, you can use cURL, neutron, or, in some cases, nova commands. If you plan to use the nova or neutron clients, install them, and then get your authentication token. If you plan to use cURL commands, get your authentication token and then export your environment variables.

note.para: You can use any combination of methods to run the commands in this guide, switching back and forth if you like. You are not locked into one method just because you started with it. All methods are available with cURL. Some methods are not available in the nova or neutron clients.

chapter.para: Regardless of which method you choose to make API calls, you must get an authentication token.
